Instructions: Hey there, Teddy! Here for some candy, yes?
I misplaced a piece of cheese at the start of my maze and I don't have time to get it back.
Think you can get it for me? If you do, I'll give you a sweet piece of candy! I'll just wait for you at the end.
Minigame: Don't forget to get the cheese Teddy!
Completion: That cheese made it through the maze like a champ. Here's your candy!
Do you know why I love cheese so much?
It's because us mice are omnivores which means that I love eating veggies, meat, and more!
Retry: Eep! You forgot to get my cheese.
Just remember to go back if you get stuck! Let's try that again.

Instructions: Hey Teddy, I just set up this new bowling lane for Halloween but my paws are too big to fit into the bowling balls.
So I'll make you a deal. You knock all those pins down for me three times and I'll give you my most delicious piece of candy.
Completion: Nice elbow work Teddy! You knocked them all down with your pumpkin roll!
Did you know that although my paws are too big for those bowling balls, they are great for fishing!
I can catch around 30 salmon with my bare paws a day! Keep that in mind!
Retry: Oops, you missed a pin or two. But I'll let you try again. You just gotta adjust your aim. Let's go again.

Instructions: Hi Teddy. I know you're here for some halloween candy but you're out of luck because I ate them all since they were all so tasty.
I saved the best one for last, but I'm not willing to give it up without a challenge. So I'll make you a deal.
If you're good enough to beat me at my cup game, I might spare it just for you! You just have to follow the bins and find the one that has my cotton candy!
Minigame: Keep your eye on the ball!
Completion: Wow! I didn't think you'd beat me at my own game!
Did you notice how fast those cups were? It's because raccoons are known for their dexterity.
We have nimble fingers that allow us to play with objects, and that's how I moved those cups around!
But here you go as promised. A piece of candy coming right up!
Retry: Darn kid, you picked the wrong bin.
You know what, since I like you so much, I'll let you try again. You gotta focus though. Let's go!

Instructions: Teddy! It's great to see you. I know you're here for some candy, but can you do me a favor first?
I hurt my leg while dancing, and now I can't get to my carrots in my backyard.
Can you jump over the rocks and grab me a dozen carrots so I can make some dinner? In return, I'll give you my favorite piece of candy.
Completion: That was great Teddy! Couldn't have hopped better myself! So, candy time!
I'm ready for some dinner. I'm sure you're curious about why I have so many carrots for dinner.
I just have to keep munching on things like carrots and other food because my teeth never stop growing.
So I use food to grind them down and keep them shiny.
Retry: Aww. You missed a jump, Teddy.
You need to time it better. Let's hop to it again.

Instructions: Hey, Teddy! I heard your brother is feeling a bit down and couldn’t join you tonight.
I have his favorite treat to cheer him up, but it comes with a little challenge.
You must have visited the other homes before you came here. I hope you remember their fun facts, because I've got a trivia for you about every critter you've met in town.
If you answer all the questions correctly, you get to bring home your brother's favorite candy.
Completion: You got every question right. Here's your well-earned candy!
Now you’re all set to go back home to your brother.
Retry: You need to brush up on your trivia if you want to get that candy.
Go back and study and then you can try again.
